mapper.select: SELECT pt.product_id, pt.product_name, pt.product_price, pt.product_img, pt.size_s, pt.size_m, pt.size_l, pt.size_xl, pt.size_xxl, ct.category_id, ct.category_name, clt.color_id, clt.color_name FROM product_tb pt left outer join category_tb ct on(ct.category_id = pt.category_id) left outer join color_tb clt on(clt.color_id = pt.color_id) where pt.product_id = #{productId}

SELECT pt.product_id, pt.product_name, pt.product_price, pt.product_img, pt.size_s, pt.size_m, pt.size_l, pt.size_xl, pt.size_xxl, ct.category_id, ct.category_name, clt.color_id, clt.color_name FROM product_tb pt left outer join category_tb ct on(ct.category_id = pt.category_id) left outer join color_tb clt on(clt.color_id = pt.color_id) where pt.product_name like concat("%",#{searhInput},"%") or clt.color_name like concat("%",#{searhInput},"%") limit ${page}, 20

SELECT count(*) as total_count FROM product_tb pt left outer join category_tb ct on(ct.category_id = pt.category_id) left outer join color_tb clt on(clt.color_id = pt.color_id) where pt.category_id = #{CategoryId}

SELECT count(*) as total_count FROM product_tb pt left outer join category_tb ct on(ct.category_id = pt.category_id) left outer join color_tb clt on(clt.color_id = pt.color_id) where pt.product_name like concat("%",#{searchInput},"%") or clt.color_name like concat("%",#{searchInput},"%")
SELECT pt.product_id, pt.product_name, pt.product_img FROM product_tb pt where pt.product_name = (select pt.product_name from product_tb pt where pt.product_id = #{productId})
